UK Statutory Instruments

The Environmental Protection (Test) Regulations 2024

These Regulations make provisions for environmental protection relating to waste management.

The Pollution Control (Amendment) Order 2024

This Order amends provisions relating to pollution prevention and control.

The Water Environment (General) Regulations 2024

These Regulations make provision for water quality monitoring.

The Health and Safety (Test) Regulations 2024

These Regulations concern workplace health and safety requirements.

The Railway Passenger Services (Test) Order 2024

This Order regulates railway passenger services.

The Parking Charges (Amendment) Regulations 2024

Amendments to parking charge regulations.

The Financial Services (Banking) Regulations 2024

Regulations for banking services under financial services framework.

The Income Tax (Earnings and Pensions) Regulations 2024

Tax regulations for earnings and pensions.

UK Public General Acts
Environmental Act 2024

An Act to make provision about environmental matters.

Education (Primary Schools) Act 2024

An Act about primary education standards.
